## packages

```{r}
library(raster)
library(ncdf4)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(smoothr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(zoo)

```

## Running Code

load the .nc

```{r}
dat <- read.csv(here::here('data', '1.0_gap_35_gap_metrics_cl_CLEAN.csv'))



```

load the shapefiles for the studyarea

```{r}
ggplot(dat, 
			aes(n_clusters, gap_value)) +
	geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = gap_value  -sk, ymax = gap_value + sk), fill = "grey", alpha = 0.5) +
	geom_point() +
	geom_line()


```
